name: valid-directory
description: Check whether or not a directory and its descendants are valid
author: 2018+ Benjamin Lupton <b@lupton.cc> (https://balupton.com)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES2017 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES2017 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es2017 && npm run our:compile:edition-es2017-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es2017: tsc --module commonjs --target ES2017 --outDir ./edition-es2017 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es2017/source || ( mv edition-es2017/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es2017 && mv edition-temp edition-es2017 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es2017/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-es2017-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES2017 --outDir ./edition-es2017-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es2017-esm/source || ( mv edition-es2017-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es2017-esm && mv edition-temp edition-es2017-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-es2017-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier
